verses.verse: Likewise <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is most <S%H6944>holy.<s%> <S%H6944><s%>

In the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> shall they <S%H7819>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof shall he <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H853>thereof;<s%> the <S%H451>rump,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7130>inwards,<s%>

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>on<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H3689>flanks,<s%> and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> that is <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H3629>kidneys,<s%> it shall he take away: <S%H5493><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a trespass <S%H817>offering.<s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof: it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place:<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is most <S%H6944>holy.<s%> <S%H6944><s%>

As the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> is, so is the trespass <S%H817>offering:<s%> there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> for them: the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> maketh <S%H3722>atonement<s%> therewith shall <S%H1961>have<s%> it.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> any <S%H376>man's<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> even the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> to himself the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H7126>offered.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H644>baked<s%> in the <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H6213>dressed<s%> in the frying <S%H4802>pan,<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4227>pan,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> it.

And <S%H3605>every<s%> meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H2720>dry,<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1961>have,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> as much as <S%H251>another.<s%>
And <S%H2063>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> he <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H5921>for<s%> a <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> <S%H7246>fried.<s%>

Besides <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H2471>cakes,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And <S%H4480>of<s%> it he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> out of the <S%H4480>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H7133>oblation<s%> for a heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's<s%> that <S%H2236>sprinkleth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> for <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> that it is <S%H7133>offered;<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5117>leave<s%> any <S%H4480>of<s%> it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a voluntary <S%H5071>offering,<s%> it shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H7126>offereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2077>sacrifice:<s%> and on the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> also the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it shall be eaten: <S%H398><s%>
But the <S%H3498>remainder<s%> of the <S%H4480>flesh<s%> <S%H1320><s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> any of the <S%H4480>flesh<s%> <S%H1320><s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> be eaten at <S%H398>all<s%> <S%H398><s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7521>accepted,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall it be <S%H2803>imputed<s%> unto him that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> it: it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H6292>abomination,<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and as for the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that be <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>thereof.<s%>

But the <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H4480>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> pertain unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> having his <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, even <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>

Moreover the <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> shall <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing, as the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H8263>abominable<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> thing, and <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H4480>flesh<s%> <S%H1320><s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> pertain unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> no <S%H3808>manner<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H2459>fat,<s%> of <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or of <S%H3775>sheep,<s%> or of <S%H5795>goat.<s%>

And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the beast that dieth of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of that which is torn with <S%H2966>beasts,<s%> may be <S%H6213>used<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> other <S%H4399>use:<s%> but ye shall in no wise <S%H3808>eat<s%> <S%H398><s%> <S%H398><s%> of it.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H929>beast,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4480><s%> men <S%H7126>offer<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H398>eateth<s%> it shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>

Moreover ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> no <S%H3808>manner<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> whether it be of <S%H5775>fowl<s%> or of <S%H929>beast,<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

Whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> it be <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H398>eateth<s%> any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> even <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H4480>people.<s%> <S%H5971><s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> He that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of the <S%H4480>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077><s%> of his peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

His own <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H2373>breast,<s%> it shall he <S%H935>bring,<s%> <S%H853><s%> that the <S%H2373>breast<s%> may be <S%H5130>waved<s%> <S%H853><s%> for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> but the <S%H2373>breast<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'.<s%>

And the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> shall ye <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> for a heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H4480>sacrifices<s%> <S%H2077><s%> of your peace <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

He among the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> that <S%H7126>offereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> for his <S%H4440>part.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and the <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> have I <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from off the <S%H4480>sacrifices<s%> <S%H2077><s%> of their peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> them unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%> by a <S%H2706>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the portion of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> out of the offerings of the LORD made by <S%H4480>fire,<s%> <S%H801><s%> <S%H3068><s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H7126>presented<s%> them to minister unto the LORD in the priest's <S%H3547>office;<s%> <S%H3068><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H5414>given<s%> them <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H4886>anointed<s%> them, by a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> of the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and of the trespass <S%H817>offering,<s%> and of the <S%H4394>consecrations,<s%> and of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H7133>oblations<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
